actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to clarify that certain greenhouses and nurseries that suffer damage as the result of severe storms or flooding in connection with a major disaster declared by the President on or after November 26, 1990, are eligible for loans under section 7 of the Small Business Act.

summary.text: Declares that certain greenhouses and nurseries which suffered substantial economic injury as a result of certain major disasters declared by the President on or after November 26, 1990, shall be eligible for loans under the Small Business Act.

titles.title: A bill to clarify that certain greenhouses and nurseries that suffer damage as the result of severe storms or flooding in connection with a major disaster declared by the President on or after November 26, 1990, are eligible for loans under section 7 of the Small Business Act.
